title: Gold Retreats as Strong US Jobs Report Dims Rate-Cut Prospects
description: Gold slipped after robust US jobs data reduced expectations the Federal Reserve will move quickly to cut interest rates.
content: Gold slipped after robust US jobs data reduced expectations the Federal Reserve will move quickly to cut interest rates.
